alert.note: Alert for Highland; Pickaway; Pike; Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 6:33AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN PICKAWAY, NORTHEASTERN PIKE, NORTHEASTERN HIGHLAND AND ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 700 AM EDT... At 632 AM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles east of Greenfield to near Highland Holiday, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chillicothe, Greenfield, Kingston, Bainbridge, Highland Holiday, North Folk Village, Rocky Fork Point, Frankfort, Londonderry, Clarksburg, Adelphi, South Salem, Mooresville, Austin, Knockemstiff, Massieville, Rocky Fork Lake, Bourneville, Andersonville and Rainsboro. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
